com.risk.view

Class PhaseView

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.risk.view.PhaseView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.Observer

    public class PhaseView
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.util.Observer
    Observer Phase class, store 1) the name of the game phase currently being played 2) the current player's name 3) information about actions that are taking place during this phase

        public void init(javafx.scene.control.Label phaseLabel,
                 javafx.scene.control.Button nextPhaseButton,
                 javafx.scene.control.Label currentPlayerLabel,
                 javafx.scene.control.Label armiesInHandLabel,
                 javafx.scene.control.Label countryALabel,
                 javafx.scene.control.Label countryANameLabel,
                 javafx.scene.control.Label countryBLabel,
                 javafx.scene.control.Label countryBNameLabel,
                 javafx.scene.control.Label numArmiesMovedLabel,
                 javafx.scene.control.TextField numArmiesMovedTextField,
                 javafx.scene.control.Label invalidMoveLabel,
                 javafx.scene.control.Button skipFortificationPhaseButton,
                 MapController mapController)
        Initialize the relative map component
        Parameters:
        phaseLabel - displays the current phase
        nextPhaseButton - allows user the enter the next phase
        currentPlayerLabel - displays the current player name
        armiesInHandLabel - displays the number of armies in current player's hand
        countryALabel - indicates the from-country
        countryANameLabel - displays the from-country name
        countryBLabel - indicates the to-country
        countryBNameLabel - displays the to-country name
        numArmiesMovedLabel - indicated the number of armies text field
        numArmiesMovedTextField - displays the num of armies text field
        invalidMoveLabel - displays the invalid move info
        skipFortificationPhaseButton - allows user to skip the fortification phase
        mapController - is the MapController reference

        Initialize the relative attack phase map component
        Parameters:
        attackerDiceLabel - indicates the attacker's dices
        attackerDiceOneButton - displays the attacker's 1 dice
        attackerDiceTwoButton - displays the attacker's 2 dices
        attackerDiceThreeButton - displays the attacker's 3 dices
        defenderDiceLabel - indicated the defender's dices
        defenderDiceOneButton - displays the defender's 1 dice
        defenderDiceTwoButton - displays the defender's 2 dice
        allOutLabel - indicates the all out mode
        allOutEnableButton - displays the all out mode is enable
        allOutDisableButton - display the all out mode is disable
        attackButton - allows user to perform attack action
